XRWebGLBindingNativeProjectionScaleFacto.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only nativeProjectionScaleFactor property of the interface represents the scaling factor by which the projection layer's resolution is multiplied by to get the native resolution of the WebXR device's frame buffer.
XRWebGLBindingNativeProjectionScaleFacto.value: A floating-point number representing by how much the device's native frame buffer size is scaled by.
